title: Women breakout
creator_credit: Halfway House Collective and Erika Addis
brief_description: This film was made by the Halfway House Collective in Melbourne and is set in Halfway House a feminist refuge. The film does not so much focus on the circumstances that led them to the Halfway House, rather it shows the house giving them support to take control of and change their lives.
